relationships.head: Scheduling Tasks with Spring
relationships.tail: Guide demonstrating task scheduling in Spring Boot using @Scheduled annotation. Includes enabling scheduling via @EnableScheduling, creating scheduled methods with fixedRate/cron configurations, and integrating with Spring Boot's auto-configuration. Requires Spring Boot dependencies and Java 17.

relationships.head: Scheduling Tasks with Spring
relationships.tail: Implement scheduled tasks to run at fixed intervals

relationships.head: Implement scheduled tasks to run at fixed intervals
